element.flavor: The continent of Bala Ged was ravaged by massive Eldrazi of Ulamog's lineage, its lush jungles and cascading rivers reduced to dust.
element.name: Bane of Bala Ged
element.text: Whenever Bane of Bala Ged attacks, defending player exiles two permanents he or she controls.

element.name: Blight Herder
element.text: When you cast Blight Herder, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: "There are some who have lost everyone and everything. They actively seek out the Eldrazi, eager for the smallest measure of vengeance."—Munda, ambush leader
element.name: Breaker of Armies
element.text: All creatures able to block Breaker of Armies do so.

element.name: Conduit of Ruin
element.text: When you cast Conduit of Ruin, you may search your library for a colorless creature card with converted mana cost 7 or greater, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.

element.flavor: "Over and over it rose. Over and over we fell."—Ganda, Goma Fada deserter
element.name: Deathless Behemoth
element.text: Vigilance Sacrifice two Eldrazi Scions: Return Deathless Behemoth from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

element.flavor: "With precise coordination and enough blood spilled, one can be driven off, even brought down. But two . . . that's a lot of blood."—Munda, ambush leader
element.name: Desolation Twin
element.text: When you cast Desolation Twin, put a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token onto the battlefield.

element.flavor: "No matter how big your champion, theirs is bigger. No matter how great your numbers, theirs are greater. No matter how voracious your appetite, they are hungrier. That is why the Eldrazi will win."—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog
element.name: Eldrazi Devastator
element.text: Trample

element.flavor: It embodies all possible meanings of the word "infinite."
element.name: Endless One
element.text: Endless One enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

element.flavor: Though Gideon arrived at Sea Gate too late to prevent the massacre, he still had enough time to lead its survivors to relative safety.
element.name: Gruesome Slaughter
element.text: Until end of turn, colorless creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature."

element.flavor: "In the dark places of our world, something horrible is growing. I fear our foes may be more numerous than we had imagined."—Nissa Revane
element.name: Kozilek's Channeler
element.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.

element.flavor: The Eldrazi hunger without limit and consume without pause.
element.name: Oblivion Sower
element.text: When you cast Oblivion Sower, target opponent exiles the top four cards of his or her library, then you may put any number of land cards that player owns from exile onto the battlefield under your control.

element.flavor: The Eldrazi continue to sweep through the wastes, compounding destruction that already seemed absolute.
element.name: Ruin Processor
element.text: When you cast Ruin Processor, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 5 life.

element.flavor: "Our people and our very lands disappear as if they never were. We no longer fight for glory, or honor. We battle now for the right to exist."—General Tazri, allied commander
element.name: Scour from Existence
element.text: Exile target permanent.

element.flavor: Dust and memory are all that remain in Ulamog's wake.
element.name: Titan's Presence
element.text: As an additional cost to cast Titan's Presence, reveal a colorless creature card from your hand. Exile target creature if its power is less than or equal to the revealed card's power.

element.flavor: A force as voracious as time itself.
element.name: Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger
element.text: When you cast Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, exile two target permanents. Indestructible Whenever Ulamog attacks, defending player exiles the top twenty cards of his or her library.

element.name: Ulamog's Despoiler
element.text: As Ulamog's Despoiler enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, Ulamog's Despoiler enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

element.flavor: "Have you ever seen a world fall to its knees? Watch, and learn."—Ob Nixilis
element.name: Void Winnower
element.text: Your opponents can't cast spells with even converted mana costs. (Zero is even.) Your opponents can't block with creatures with even converted mana costs.

element.flavor: "No more fear. No more failure. No more death. No more!"
element.name: Angel of Renewal
element.text: Flying When Angel of Renewal enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

element.flavor: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."
element.name: Angelic Gift
element.text: Enchant creature When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying.

element.flavor: Though losses run high among the scouts of the Stone Havens, they never flinch from their duty.
element.name: Cliffside Lookout
element.text: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Sea Gate has fallen. Survivors are on the move. Will send another griffin when we find refuge. Stay hidden. Stay safe."—Message from Tars Olan, kor world-gift
element.name: Courier Griffin
element.text: Flying When Courier Griffin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

element.name: Emeria Shepherd
element.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that land is a Plains, you may return that nonland permanent card to the battlefield instead.

element.name: Encircling Fissure
element.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures target opponent controls. Awaken 2—{4}{W} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}, also put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: The unofficial motto of every expedition house is "ready for anything," a phrase whose significance has been amplified since the emergence of the Eldrazi.
element.name: Expedition Envoy

element.flavor: Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.
element.name: Felidar Cub
element.text: Sacrifice Felidar Cub: Destroy target enchantment.

element.flavor: It surveys the withering landscape, waiting for a victory only it can see.
element.name: Felidar Sovereign
element.text: Vigilance, lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.

element.flavor: The refuge's defenses allow new recruits to see lesser Eldrazi up close, steeling their stomachs for what's to come.
element.name: Fortified Rampart
element.text: Defender

element.flavor: Mystics of the Stone Havens call upon the spirits of fallen heroes to defend the refuges.
element.name: Ghostly Sentinel
element.text: Flying, vigilance

element.name: Gideon, Ally of Zendikar
element.text: +1: Until end of turn, Gideon, Ally of Zendikar becomes a 5/5 Human Soldier Ally creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. 0: Put a 2/2 white Knight Ally creature token onto the battlefield. −4: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+1."

element.flavor: "Suddenly, Gideon was there with us, clearing the way so that we could escape."—The War Diaries
element.name: Gideon's Reproach
element.text: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

element.flavor: "They seek to break us. Let us show them our strength!"
element.name: Hero of Goma Fada
element.text: Rally — Whenever Hero of Goma Fada or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

element.flavor: "For the lands you have lost and the beauty that remains, for freedom and the future, we must hold nothing back!"—Gideon Jura
element.name: Inspired Charge
element.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "The wind in one's hair, the sun on one's back, the joy of open skies . . . the next generation of kor must know this kind of peace."
element.name: Kitesail Scout
element.text: Flying

element.flavor: The high-pitched whirl of a hook is the only battle cry she needs.
element.name: Kor Bladewhirl
element.text: Rally — Whenever Kor Bladewhirl or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

element.flavor: "He told us not to worry, and he walked into the cavern. The swirling mass of Eldrazi parted to admit him, then closed in his wake."—Akiri, kor line-slinger
element.name: Kor Castigator
element.text: Kor Castigator can't be blocked by Eldrazi Scions.

element.flavor: "We came into this world together. We fight for this world together. We'll leave this world together."
element.name: Kor Entanglers
element.text: Rally — Whenever Kor Entanglers or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

element.flavor: Hedron lanterns fend off more than just the darkness.
element.name: Lantern Scout
element.text: Rally — Whenever Lantern Scout or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Even in the hands of amateurs, Nahiri's hedrons can harm the Eldrazi."—Ugin
element.name: Lithomancer's Focus
element.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn by colorless sources.

element.flavor: Working with his noble mount, he notices every form on the horizon, every scent in the air, every tremor in the earth.
element.name: Makindi Patrol
element.text: Rally — Whenever Makindi Patrol or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

element.flavor: "May your horns get lodged in an Eldrazi's bony face, ornery brute!"—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad
element.name: Ondu Greathorn
element.text: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Ondu Greathorn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.name: Ondu Rising
element.text: Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gains lifelink until end of turn. Awaken 4—{4}{W} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.name: Planar Outburst
element.text: Destroy all nonland creatures. Awaken 4—{5}{W}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}{W}{W}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.name: Quarantine Field
element.text: Quarantine Field enters the battlefield with X isolation counters on it. When Quarantine Field enters the battlefield, for each isolation counter on it, exile up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Quarantine Field leaves the battlefield.

element.name: Retreat to Emeria
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • Put a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token onto the battlefield. • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "We can use their hunger to lead them into danger. If we're already prey, we may as well be bait!"—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist
element.name: Roil's Retribution
element.text: Roil's Retribution deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures.

element.flavor: "I can give you strength, but you'll have to bring your own courage."
element.name: Serene Steward
element.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

element.flavor: A few bands of kor sought refuge from the Eldrazi in Zendikar's vast cave networks, relying on their ability to survive in harsh vertical landscapes.
element.name: Shadow Glider
element.text: Flying

element.name: Sheer Drop
element.text: Destroy target tapped creature. Awaken 3—{5}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: After watching the kor in battle, Gideon understood the difference between working together and working as one.
element.name: Smite the Monstrous
element.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

element.name: Stasis Snare
element.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Stasis Snare enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Stasis Snare leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

element.flavor: "These days, soldiers never stick around long enough for a proper healing. They just want me to knit them up so they can hurry back to the fight."
element.name: Stone Haven Medic
element.text: {W}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

element.flavor: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.
element.name: Tandem Tactics
element.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

element.flavor: The kor's pride in their independence has given way to a strong sense of community that embraces all of Zendikar.
element.name: Unified Front
element.text: Converge — Put a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token onto the battlefield for each color of mana spent to cast Unified Front.

element.name: Adverse Conditions
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.name: Benthic Infiltrator
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) Benthic Infiltrator can't be blocked.

element.flavor: "The seas are no less imperiled than the dry lands. This fight is mine as much as it is yours."—Kiora, to Gideon Jura
element.name: Cryptic Cruiser
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) {2}{U}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Tap target creature.

element.name: Drowner of Hope
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Drowner of Hope enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." Sacrifice an Eldrazi Scion: Tap target creature.

element.name: Eldrazi Skyspawner
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flying When Eldrazi Skyspawner enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: "We are nothing but dust to them—our bodies, our actions, even our words."—Jori En, expedition leader
element.name: Horribly Awry
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Counter target creature spell with converted mana cost 4 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

element.flavor: The touch of an Eldrazi brings life and death in turn.
element.name: Incubator Drone
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Incubator Drone enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: The wastes spread as quickly as the wind.
element.name: Mist Intruder
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flying Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

element.flavor: If you can see it, it's too late.
element.name: Murk Strider
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Murk Strider enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.

element.flavor: Whatever it is searching for, it will stop at nothing to find it.
element.name: Oracle of Dust
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) {2}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.

element.name: Ruination Guide
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) Other colorless creatures you control get +1/+0.

element.name: Salvage Drone
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) When Salvage Drone dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

element.name: Spell Shrivel
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

element.flavor: It didn't do much, but the residents of Sea Gate gave it a wide berth all the same.
element.name: Tide Drifter
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Other colorless creatures you control get +0/+1.

element.name: Ulamog's Reclaimer
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Ulamog's Reclaimer enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

element.flavor: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.
element.name: Anticipate
element.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

element.flavor: There are more sights on Zendikar than the eyes can see.
element.name: Brilliant Spectrum
element.text: Converge — Draw X cards, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Brilliant Spectrum. Then discard two cards.

element.flavor: When Emeria's worshippers learned that she was no more than a twisted memory of Emrakul, they abandoned their temples to the god. The deserted shrines now serve as breeding grounds for the mantas.
element.name: Cloud Manta
element.text: Flying

element.name: Clutch of Currents
element.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Awaken 3—{4}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.name: Coastal Discovery
element.text: Draw two cards. Awaken 4—{5}{U} (If you cast this spell for {5}{U}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."—Jori En, expedition leader
element.name: Coralhelm Guide
element.text: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

element.flavor: "Quiet now, you dreadful vermin."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage
element.name: Dampening Pulse
element.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

element.flavor: "I said we should destroy the Eldrazi. Ugin wanted to return them to stasis. Ugin's arguments were . . . unconvincing."—Jace Beleren
element.name: Dispel
element.text: Counter target instant spell.

element.flavor: "I can't control its mind—I'm not even sure it has one. But I can dominate its will."
element.name: Exert Influence
element.text: Converge — Gain control of target creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast Exert Influence.

element.name: Guardian of Tazeem
element.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls. If that land is an Island, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

element.flavor: "Quiet the waves? Why would I want to do that?"
element.name: Halimar Tidecaller
element.text: When Halimar Tidecaller enters the battlefield, you may return target card with awaken from your graveyard to your hand. Land creatures you control have flying.

element.name: Part the Waterveil
element.text: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Part the Waterveil. Awaken 6—{6}{U}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for {6}{U}{U}{U}, also put six +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.name: Prism Array
element.text: Converge — Prism Array enters the battlefield with a crystal counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Remove a crystal counter from Prism Array: Tap target creature. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

element.name: Retreat to Coralhelm
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • You may tap or untap target creature. • Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

element.flavor: Weather on Zendikar is unpredictable—unless you're the one telling it what to do.
element.name: Roilmage's Trick
element.text: Converge — Creatures your opponents control get -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Roilmage's Trick. Draw a card.

element.name: Rush of Ice
element.text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Awaken 3—{4}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.name: Scatter to the Winds
element.text: Counter target spell. Awaken 3—{4}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: Having gone to the trouble of stealing a bident from a god on another world, Kiora was eager to test its capabilities.
element.name: Tightening Coils
element.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -6/-0 and loses flying.

element.flavor: "You speak to me of the threat of Ulamog. But do not forget: they came as three."—Ugin, to Jace Beleren
element.name: Ugin's Insight
element.text: Scry X, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control, then draw three cards.

element.flavor: "Do you see? All of Tazeem strains at its tether."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage
element.name: Wave-Wing Elemental
element.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Wave-Wing Elemental gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.name: Windrider Patrol
element.text: Flying Whenever Windrider Patrol deals combat damage to a player, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

element.flavor: "We returned to the field and found poor Len, every detail of his final moment perfectly cast in that awful dust."—Javad Nasrin, outrider captain
element.name: Complete Disregard
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

element.flavor: Silence rules Bala Ged, broken only by the skittering of Eldrazi.
element.name: Culling Drone
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

element.name: Dominator Drone
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) When Dominator Drone enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.

element.name: Grave Birthing
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Target opponent exiles a card from his or her graveyard. You put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." Draw a card.

element.flavor: As the hand closed, there was first terror, then numbness, and finally nothingness.
element.name: Grip of Desolation
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Exile target creature and target land.

element.flavor: It consumes any dreams of victory.
element.name: Mind Raker
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Mind Raker enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, each opponent discards a card.

element.flavor: "I watched it pass at a distance. When I looked back to my companions, Najet was dead."—Akiri, kor line-slinger
element.name: Silent Skimmer
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flying Whenever Silent Skimmer attacks, defending player loses 2 life.

element.name: Skitterskin
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Skitterskin can't block. {1}{B}: Regenerate Skitterskin. Activate this ability only if you control another colorless creature.

element.name: Sludge Crawler
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) {2}: Sludge Crawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.name: Smothering Abomination
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a creature, draw a card.

element.flavor: The Eldrazi rampaged across Zendikar in a tide of chittering, heaving flesh.
element.name: Swarm Surge
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Colorless creatures you control also gain first strike until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Fear of the unknown can be a wonderfully innocent thing, relatively speaking."—Anowon, the Ruin Sage
element.name: Transgress the Mind
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 3 or greater and exile that card.

element.name: Wasteland Strangler
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Wasteland Strangler enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "I will secure my revenge on Zendikar one soul at a time."—Ob Nixilis
element.name: Altar's Reap
element.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

element.flavor: "Let the vampires join us. In this war, we no longer have the luxury of choosing our comrades."—General Tazri, allied commander
element.name: Bloodbond Vampire
element.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.

element.flavor: Vastly outnumbered, the Zendikari found creative ways to even the odds.
element.name: Bone Splinters
element.text: As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

element.flavor: "Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
element.name: Carrier Thrall
element.text: When Carrier Thrall dies, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: "Despite their bravado, mortals are fragile. If Zendikar is to endure, its lords must save it."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
element.name: Defiant Bloodlord
element.text: Flying Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

element.flavor: "Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."—Ob Nixilis
element.name: Demon's Grasp
element.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "I will not live as a slave. If you would be free, then fight alongside me."
element.name: Drana, Liberator of Malakir
element.text: Flying, first strike Whenever Drana, Liberator of Malakir deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.

element.flavor: When Malakir's surgeons failed, its death-shamans took over.
element.name: Dutiful Return
element.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

element.name: Geyserfield Stalker
element.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyserfield Stalker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.name: Guul Draz Overseer
element.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If that land is a Swamp, those creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn instead.

element.flavor: "It's hard to find their weak points, but I very much enjoy the discovery process."
element.name: Hagra Sharpshooter
element.text: {4}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Time and again, I have demonstrated my skills as a healer. Why, then, are you so ill at ease?"
element.name: Kalastria Healer
element.text: Rally — Whenever Kalastria Healer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

element.flavor: "Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
element.name: Kalastria Nightwatch
element.text: Whenever you gain life, Kalastria Nightwatch gains flying until end of turn.

element.flavor: "They are deadly, and they are loyal. We can spare them a little blood."—Harak, Malakir bloodwitch
element.name: Malakir Familiar
element.text: Flying, deathtouch Whenever you gain life, Malakir Familiar gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.name: Mire's Malice
element.text: Target opponent discards two cards. Awaken 3—{5}{B} (If you cast this spell for {5}{B}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: Nirkana assassins craft incurable concoctions by mixing basilisk marrow and deathwillow sap with the vital fluids of a dozen other poisonous species.
element.name: Nirkana Assassin
element.text: Whenever you gain life, Nirkana Assassin gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

element.name: Ob Nixilis Reignited
element.text: +1: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. −3: Destroy target creature. −8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

element.flavor: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.
element.name: Painful Truths
element.text: Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Painful Truths.

element.name: Retreat to Hagra
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. • Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

element.name: Rising Miasma
element.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Awaken 3—{5}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for {5}{B}{B}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.name: Ruinous Path
element.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Awaken 4—{5}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for {5}{B}{B}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: For vampires, blood carries more than life. Memories long eroded from the minds of bloodchiefs can be reclaimed from the veins of their sired kin.
element.name: Vampiric Rites
element.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

element.flavor: "These days, there's no shortage of food for the nulls of Guul Draz."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
element.name: Voracious Null
element.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on Voracious Null. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

element.flavor: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."
element.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
element.text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

element.flavor: Terrible fury. Excellent aim.
element.name: Barrage Tyrant
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) {2}{R}, Sacrifice another colorless creature: Barrage Tyrant deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

element.name: Crumble to Dust
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

element.flavor: It moves through the tunnels as slowly and surely as the shifting stones.
element.name: Kozilek's Sentinel
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Kozilek's Sentinel gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Some detours just aren't worth it."—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter
element.name: Molten Nursery
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Molten Nursery deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

element.name: Nettle Drone
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) {T}: Nettle Drone deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast a colorless spell, untap Nettle Drone.

element.flavor: Ulamog's processors trail behind him, converting ruined matter into furious energy.
element.name: Processor Assault
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) As an additional cost to cast Processor Assault, put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. Processor Assault deals 5 damage to target creature.

element.name: Serpentine Spike
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Serpentine Spike deals 2 damage to target creature, 3 damage to another target creature, and 4 damage to a third target creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

element.flavor: Some wounds never heal.
element.name: Touch of the Void
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Touch of the Void deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

element.flavor: "No, don't! Nal, it's me—"
element.name: Turn Against
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

element.flavor: Emrakul has not been seen in months. Though her brood's numbers have dwindled in her absence, each drone is still a deadly threat.
element.name: Vestige of Emrakul
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Trample

element.name: Vile Aggregate
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Vile Aggregate's power is equal to the number of colorless creatures you control. Trample Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

element.name: Akoum Firebird
element.text: Flying, haste Akoum Firebird attacks each turn if able. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {4}{R}{R}. If you do, return Akoum Firebird from your graveyard to the battlefield.

element.name: Akoum Hellkite
element.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage to that creature or player instead.

element.name: Akoum Stonewaker
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste onto the battlefield. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

element.flavor: "Whiptails can sense a traveler's footsteps from a great distance. Measuring that distance has been . . . difficult."—Jalun, Affa sentry
element.name: Belligerent Whiptail
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.

element.name: Boiling Earth
element.text: Boiling Earth deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Awaken 4—{6}{R} (If you cast this spell for {6}{R}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: With a single act of bravery, she went from expendable to indispensable.
element.name: Chasm Guide
element.text: Rally — Whenever Chasm Guide or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

element.flavor: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."
element.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
element.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

element.flavor: "Come on, you twisted things! Don't you want to get acquainted?"
element.name: Firemantle Mage
element.text: Rally — Whenever Firemantle Mage or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

element.flavor: "The Eldrazi may not be intimidated, but if it boosts the goblins' confidence, I see no reason to discourage it."—Jalun, Affa sentry
element.name: Goblin War Paint
element.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

element.flavor: Goblins were first to see the potential of hedrons in the fight against the Eldrazi, for the magical stones came ready-made with pointy bits.
element.name: Lavastep Raider
element.text: {2}{R}: Lavastep Raider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

element.flavor: After a battle, it breaks the hillsides into manageable pieces to prepare for next time.
element.name: Makindi Sliderunner
element.text: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Makindi Sliderunner gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Put a minotaur at the head of an army and suddenly all the soldiers act like they have horns."—Gideon Jura
element.name: Ondu Champion
element.text: Rally — Whenever Ondu Champion or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

element.flavor: Everyone who could still lift a weapon had a part in retaking Sea Gate.
element.name: Outnumber
element.text: Outnumber deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control.

element.flavor: The fires of Zendikar are always hungry, and there is much on which they can feed.
element.name: Radiant Flames
element.text: Converge — Radiant Flames deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Radiant Flames.

element.flavor: "You have a family. Mine died at Sea Gate. You go to yours, and I'll go to mine."
element.name: Reckless Cohort
element.text: Reckless Cohort attacks each combat if able unless you control another Ally.

element.name: Retreat to Valakut
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature can't block this turn.

element.flavor: "Zendikar is always angry, though I've never seen that anger so precisely directed."—Nablus, North Hada trapper
element.name: Rolling Thunder
element.text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

element.flavor: Saved from certain death by the kor, he considers himself bound to them by an unbreakable blood oath.
element.name: Shatterskull Recruit
element.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

element.flavor: Akoum can make any intruder look small.
element.name: Stonefury
element.text: Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

element.flavor: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.
element.name: Sure Strike
element.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

element.flavor: As Ulamog's brood reduces the earth to dust, geopedes burst from their tunnels in search of solid ground.
element.name: Tunneling Geopede
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Tunneling Geopede deals 1 damage to each opponent.

element.flavor: "As long as we have walked this world, we have known it as a harsh and unforgiving place."—The Invokers' Tales
element.name: Valakut Invoker
element.text: {8}: Valakut Invoker deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

element.flavor: "Whatever volcanoes dream of, it seems like they always wake up grumpy."—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter
element.name: Valakut Predator
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Valakut Predator gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.flavor: Like a living organism, Zendikar rids itself of infection, and it does so abruptly and ruthlessly.
element.name: Volcanic Upheaval
element.text: Destroy target land.

element.flavor: "A hedron holds magic for a thousand years—or less, if need be."
element.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
element.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

element.flavor: A blisterpod's corpse is a scion's cradle.
element.name: Blisterpod
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Blisterpod dies, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: The tenderness of a mother. The pity of a mantis.
element.name: Brood Monitor
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Brood Monitor enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.
element.name: Call the Scions
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Put two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: Every Eldrazi in Ulamog's lineage is an extension of the titan's will.
element.name: Eyeless Watcher
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Eyeless Watcher enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.name: From Beyond
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." {1}{G}, Sacrifice From Beyond: Search your library for an Eldrazi card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

element.flavor: The battle served as a grim reminder of what a final victory for the Eldrazi would mean.
element.name: Unnatural Aggression
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. If the creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

element.flavor: The Eldrazi don't merely extinguish life—they supplant it.
element.name: Void Attendant
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) {1}{G}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: "They come because I call. They stay because I listen."
element.name: Beastcaller Savant
element.text: Haste {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

element.flavor: The native creatures of Zendikar have adapted to live under rocks and crawl through underbrush in order to avoid the most voracious predators. The Eldrazi have yet to make such adjustments.
element.name: Broodhunter Wurm
Earthen Arms
element.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target permanent. Awaken 4—{6}{G} (If you cast this spell for {6}{G}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: "I always thought the great insects of Tazeem were frightening until I saw the Eldrazi. Now I welcome the sight of mantises perched in the treetops."—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout
element.name: Giant Mantis
element.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

element.name: Greenwarden of Murasa
element.text: When Greenwarden of Murasa enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand. When Greenwarden of Murasa dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

element.flavor: "Zendikar has given us the weapons to wage war on the appropriate scale."—Najiya, leader of the Tajuru
element.name: Infuse with the Elements
element.text: Converge — Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Infuse with the Elements. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

element.flavor: On Murasa, even the trees grow trees.
element.name: Jaddi Offshoot
element.text: Defender Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

element.flavor: "The land is not dead, merely sick. I will nurse it back to health."
element.name: Lifespring Druid
element.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

element.flavor: "If you're not prepared to fight, you'd best be prepared to die."
element.name: Murasa Ranger
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {3}{G}. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Murasa Ranger.

element.flavor: "Zendikar will not surrender, and neither can we."
element.name: Natural Connection
element.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

element.flavor: Her connection to the plane restored, Nissa felt the power of Zendikar surge through her.
element.name: Nissa's Renewal
element.text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. You gain 7 life.

element.name: Oran-Rief Hydra
element.text: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Hydra. If that land is a Forest, put two +1/+1 counters on Oran-Rief Hydra instead.

element.flavor: "The world was not hostile to us—we were beneath its notice, and presented no danger."—The Invokers' Tales
element.name: Oran-Rief Invoker
element.text: {8}: Oran-Rief Invoker gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

element.flavor: "It might fight the Eldrazi, but don't mistake it for a companion, Gideon. It's not interested in your concept of strength through unity."—Najiya, leader of the Tajuru
element.name: Plated Crusher
element.text: Trample, hexproof

element.flavor: The elf's blade carved deep into the Eldrazi drone's fleshy lattices. Without a sound, the drone lost equilibrium and tumbled from the sky.
element.name: Plummet
element.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

element.flavor: "This world tires of its long occupation."—Nissa Revane
element.name: Reclaiming Vines
element.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

element.name: Retreat to Kazandu
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • You gain 2 life.

element.flavor: "If I die, feed me to a shambler. At least that way I'll be doing some good."—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout
element.name: Rot Shambler
element.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rot Shambler.

element.flavor: Eldrazi are not the leopard's preferred prey, but they are better than no prey at all.
element.name: Scythe Leopard
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Scythe Leopard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "In my downtime I used to paint the vistas. Now the vistas disappear faster than my downtime."
element.name: Seek the Wilds
element.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

element.flavor: All of Zendikar's beings sense the upheaval that accompanies the Eldrazi.
element.name: Snapping Gnarlid
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Gnarlid gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Nissa is not the only one with a deep connection to Zendikar's primal elements."—Kiora
element.name: Swell of Growth
element.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

element.flavor: "As long as there is a single shred of life, there is hope."—Nissa Revane
element.name: Sylvan Scrying
element.text: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

element.flavor: "My mount needs neither reins nor bridle. We both share a common purpose."
element.name: Tajuru Beastmaster
element.text: Rally — Whenever Tajuru Beastmaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "In its time of hardship, all of Zendikar cries out in pain. Are you listening?"
element.name: Tajuru Stalwart
element.text: Converge — Tajuru Stalwart enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

element.flavor: Her rallying cry reaches far beyond the Tajuru elves, inspiring all those who hear it.
element.name: Tajuru Warcaller
element.text: Rally — Whenever Tajuru Warcaller or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.flavor: It knows nothing of Eldrazi or Planeswalkers, just that there are new intruders in its territory.
element.name: Territorial Baloth
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.name: Undergrowth Champion
element.text: If damage would be dealt to Undergrowth Champion while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from Undergrowth Champion. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Undergrowth Champion.

element.flavor: "The elements understand better than anyone that actions speak louder than words."—Gideon Jura
element.name: Woodland Wanderer
element.text: Vigilance, trample Converge — Woodland Wanderer enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

element.name: Brood Butcher
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Brood Butcher enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." {B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

element.name: Brutal Expulsion
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Choose one or both — • Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand. • Brutal Expulsion deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

element.name: Catacomb Sifter
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Catacomb Sifter enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." Whenever another creature you control dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

element.flavor: The only traces it leaves are silent gusts and prodigious amounts of wreckage.
element.name: Dust Stalker
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Haste At the beginning of each end step, if you control no other colorless creatures, return Dust Stalker to its owner's hand.

element.name: Fathom Feeder
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Deathtouch Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) {3}{U}{B}: Draw a card. Each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library.

element.flavor: "While we delay, they're on the move. They will not wait as we bicker. We are losing this war by moments as our goal slips beyond our reach."—Gideon Jura
element.name: Forerunner of Slaughter
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) {1}: Target colorless creature gains haste until end of turn.

element.flavor: "Some Eldrazi, their purpose is obvious: suck the life out of the land, birth new Eldrazi. Others aren't so obvious, and those are the ones that make me really nervous."—Chadir the Navigator
element.name: Herald of Kozilek
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Colorless spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

element.flavor: As the great scourge passed by, Zendikar shivered, then lay silent.
element.name: Sire of Stagnation
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player exiles the top two cards of his or her library and you draw two cards.

element.name: Ulamog's Nullifier
element.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flash Flying When Ulamog's Nullifier enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, counter target spell.

element.flavor: As the soldiers beneath her raised their voices, the angel spread her wings, their span seeming to cover the sky.
element.name: Angelic Captain
element.text: Flying Whenever Angelic Captain attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Ally.

element.name: Bring to Light
element.text: Converge — Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast Bring to Light, exile that card, then shuffle your library. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

element.flavor: "The taste of freedom is sweeter than blood."
element.name: Drana's Emissary
element.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

element.flavor: "The land will not wait for the enemy to arrive."—Nissa Revane
element.name: Grove Rumbler
element.text: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Grove Rumbler gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

element.flavor: "The seedlings scream for us to loose them upon the Eldrazi, and we shall oblige."
element.name: Grovetender Druids
element.text: Rally — Whenever Grovetender Druids or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a 1/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield.

element.name: Kiora, Master of the Depths
element.text: +1: Untap up to one target creature and up to one target land. −2: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature." Then put three 8/8 blue Octopus creature tokens onto the battlefield.

element.flavor: They came from all walks of life, from every part of Zendikar, and they returned with one unifying cause.
element.name: March from the Tomb
element.text: Return any number of target Ally creature cards with total converted mana cost 8 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

element.name: Munda, Ambush Leader
element.text: Haste Rally — Whenever Munda, Ambush Leader or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal any number of Ally cards from among them, then put those cards on top of your library in any order and the rest on the bottom in any order.

element.flavor: After many years as a lullmage, Noyan Dar turned his talents from allaying Zendikar's fury to the considerably easier task of rousing it.
element.name: Noyan Dar, Roil Shaper
element.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. If you do, that land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste that's still a land.

element.name: Omnath, Locus of Rage
element.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a 5/5 red and green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield. Whenever Omnath, Locus of Rage or another Elemental you control dies, Omnath deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

element.flavor: "Great steel is born in the hottest forges. Great soldiers are born in war."
element.name: Resolute Blademaster
element.text: Rally — Whenever Resolute Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

element.name: Roil Spout
element.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Awaken 4—{4}{W}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}{U}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

element.flavor: "It may be unconventional, but I'll take any steady mount in a storm."
element.name: Skyrider Elf
element.text: Flying Converge — Skyrider Elf enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

element.name: Veteran Warleader
element.text: Veteran Warleader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Tap another untapped Ally you control: Veteran Warleader gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.

element.flavor: The last hedron slotted into place, locking Ulamog in an infinite loop of binding energy.
element.name: Aligned Hedron Network
element.text: When Aligned Hedron Network enters the battlefield, exile all creatures with power 5 or greater until Aligned Hedron Network leaves the battlefield. (Those creatures return under their owners' control.)

element.flavor: "You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned.""And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.
element.name: Hedron Archive
element.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

element.name: Hedron Blade
element.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by one or more colorless creatures, it gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

element.flavor: Also called "pathway stones," hedron shards can immobilize Eldrazi on contact.
element.name: Pathway Arrows
element.text: Equipped creature has "{2}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature. If a colorless creature is dealt damage this way, tap it." Equip {2}

element.flavor: Each time it is sent to find a safe haven, it takes longer to return.
element.name: Pilgrim's Eye
element.text: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

element.flavor: Neither subtle nor pretty.
element.name: Slab Hammer
element.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand. If you do, the creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {2}

element.name: Ally Encampment
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast an Ally spell. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Ally Encampment: Return target Ally you control to its owner's hand.

element.flavor: Once, water ran here. Now only dust and ash fall from the clifftops.
element.name: Blighted Cataract
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

element.flavor: "We came to a place where the skin of Zendikar was peeled back and its bones lay bare to the sky."—Greenweaver Mina
element.name: Blighted Fen
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

element.flavor: The land is dying, but it will not go peacefully.
element.name: Blighted Gorge
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Gorge: Blighted Gorge deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

element.flavor: "When a limb is gangrenous, you cut it off. This is no different."—Greenweaver Mina
element.name: Blighted Steppe
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Steppe: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

element.name: Blighted Woodland
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

element.flavor: The continent of Murasa lies beneath a blanket of dense vegetation, its enormous branches tangled so thickly that some inhabitants never see the ground.
element.name: Canopy Vista
element.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.) Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

element.flavor: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.
element.name: Cinder Glade
element.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.) Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

element.flavor: The Eldrazi may be ruthless, but Zendikar is relentless.
element.name: Evolving Wilds
element.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

element.name: Fertile Thicket
element.text: Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. When Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one basic land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in any order. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

element.name: Looming Spires
element.text: Looming Spires enters the battlefield tapped. When Looming Spires enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

element.name: Lumbering Falls
element.text: Lumbering Falls enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. {2}{G}{U}: Lumbering Falls becomes a 3/3 green and blue Elemental creature with hexproof until end of turn. It's still a land.

element.name: Mortuary Mire
element.text: Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield tapped. When Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

element.flavor: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.
element.name: Prairie Stream
element.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.) Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

element.name: Sanctum of Ugin
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. Whenever you cast a colorless spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, you may sacrifice Sanctum of Ugin. If you do, search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

element.name: Sandstone Bridge
element.text: Sandstone Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sandstone Bridge enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

element.name: Shambling Vent
element.text: Shambling Vent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. {1}{W}{B}: Shambling Vent becomes a 2/3 white and black Elemental creature with lifelink until end of turn. It's still a land.

element.flavor: The gods known to the merfolk as Ula, Emeria, and Cosi were nothing more than false memories of a monstrous trinity: the Eldrazi titans Ulamog, Emrakul, and Kozilek.
element.name: Shrine of the Forsaken Gods
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells. Activate this ability only if you control seven or more lands.

element.name: Skyline Cascade
element.text: Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield tapped. When Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

element.flavor: The continent of Guul Draz is a geothermal swampland reeking of heat and decay.
element.name: Smoldering Marsh
element.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.) Smoldering Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

element.flavor: Young Eldrazi crawl forth from the dust, compelled by a greater will.
element.name: Spawning Bed
element.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

element.flavor: On the continent of Tazeem, rushing waters plunge through narrow canyons into mist-cloaked lakes.
element.name: Sunken Hollow
element.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.) Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
